TopicTitle: [unnoficial]bobcat inc american pack/soyuz pack discussion thread

Articles.Content: This thread is for discussing the two packs,soviet pack,and the american pack.Those packs are my favorites,so i want to hear a couple of opinions about it.

-I don't understand the old symbols in the staging list.

-I don't like having pre-built stuff, the pack is like a 10-part lego set with instructions.

-Stuff doesn't blend -at all- with the other parts in the game, which is important or the kind of build-test-fly game KSP is.

That aside, I think Bobcat is very talented modder, and I have used many mods from him, like the DEMVs an the HOME pack.

-Stuff doesn't blend -at all- with the other parts in the game, which is important or the kind of build-test-fly game KSP is.

I get excited being able to fly my own rockets alongside replicas of real things, so the pre-built-ness of it is great for me. I can build my own rockets just fine with KW and NP, if thats what I feel like doing, but no scratch-built rocket will look anywhere as good as a purpose-built soyuz model, nor will it keep to scale
I love the Soviet pack, but it crashes the game for me. I'll surely revisit it once KSP matures a little.
